Name: RagingFist
About the game: Key Features: ■This game is a two-player fighting game! Shared Screen Play against your friends! Players are playing against each other on the same computer, ■Operate the character through the keyboard, Just push the button to make a move, and use one key to perform its nirvana! Only 4 buttons are needed to make a move. In RagingFist, the control is easier to get started than most fighting games. ■Players who have never played any fighting games do not need to worry. Don't be afraid! ! Use our '4 buttons' system for simple control. ■Simple Controls & Exciting Battles!!! Become the winner of the game in the local 1VS1! Two pirates (Character) comes with unique design moves and super! Choose the pirate you like and start fighting. Game plot: The little simp has grown into a brave man, after 7 years have passed. When Stortebeker returned to the old land, he met Elisabeth, his the queen of simp. Elisabeth was pirates in the southern Baltic Sea. At this time, Stortebeker secretly boarded a ship controlled by the Elisabeth family. Stortebeker get raging and prepare for Raging Fist to Elisabeth.
